content: I really loved your story, especially the first half of your story when you talk about student debt and your lifestyle after college. I completed my first year of college at a local state university but it still cost me $30,000 which of course I had to pay for in the form of loans. When you graduated and stared at the number for your student loan debt, did it feel crippling? I am already concerned about my student loan debt and really just worried about life after college.
